import React from 'react'; const MainMenu = (props) => { let buttonProp = { title: 'Switch to dark mode', className: 'nav-link btn-dark-mode' }; if (props.isDark) { buttonProp = { title: 'Switch to classic mode', className: 'nav-link btn-dark-mode active' }; } return (
) } export default MainMenu;
